ComicInfo.Title: Love Evernever; Ch3ryl; The Gift That Keeps on Giving Killing
ComicInfo.Series: Fear the Funhouse: Toybox of Terror
ComicInfo.Summary: In Riverdale, even the toys are terrifying in this anthology one-shot set in the universe of last year's successful Fear the Funhouse comic. Three tales of dolls, robots, and puppets gone awry all thanks to the work of a shadowy toymaker and a young girl intent on revenge, in the vein of the widely successful M3GAN movie and Child's Play franchise.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-07-04 12:14:23. [CVDB1026071]
ComicInfo.Writer: Timmy Heague, Danielle Paige, Michael Northrop
ComicInfo.Penciller: Ryan Caskey, Tango, Ryan Jampole, Ryan Caskey, Ryan Jampole, Tango
ComicInfo.Editor: Jamie Lee Rotante, Stephen Oswald, Vincent Lovallo, Mike Pellerito
ComicInfo.Characters: Archie Andrews, Betty Cooper, Cheryl Blossom, Evelyn Evernever, Hot Dog, Jughead Jones, Mad Doctor Doom, Midge Klump, Moose Mason, Penelope Blossom, Veronica Lodge
ComicInfo.ScanInformation: DrVink. Library loans through OverDrive and Kindle; ripped with Calibre DeDRM. Library loans through Hoopla, plus other sources; webrip. Denoised and upscaled with waifu2x-caffe or other tools.
